entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
